about_the_game: The Alternate Costume Pack allows you to change all six main characters' clothes, from in-game sprite to character portraits. Experience the Old North in fashion by changing costumes through the party menu. No need to find a wardrobe to get the look you want!
detailed_description: The Alternate Costume Pack allows you to change all six main characters' clothes, from in-game sprite to character portraits. Experience the Old North in fashion by changing costumes through the party menu. No need to find a wardrobe to get the look you want!
legal_notice: All trademarks referenced herein are the properties of Ekuator Games and their respective owners. Digital Tribe Games © 2015. All Rights Reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.1 GHz
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Sound Card: DirectX9.0c Compatible Audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9.5 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.1 GHz
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • Sound Card: DirectX9.0c Compatible Audio

name: Celestian Tales: Old North - Alternate Costume Pack

  • OS *: Windows® 7 and Windows® 8
